entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 58 km/h gust 69 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
